item.description:
Hello Everyone,

Since the last breakfast months ago was such a success I thought why not do it again?  The Whistle Stop in Windsor, CT is a great place that serves up delicious breakfasts.   It won't matter of you are in the mood for an omelette, pancakes, eggs and sides or waffles they'll have the bases covered with portions that are sure to please.   I have arranged to use their gathering room and hopefully we'll fill it up for them.   No fuss at bill time, either, as there will be separate checks for all.   Come and start your day with a smile, some wonderful food and be ready to meet some super people!

group.name: The Eastern CT Widows and Widowers Meetup Group

item.name: Breakfast Again!
